name: NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE
summary:
In Needy Girl Overdose, foster a girl with a need for approval and an internet obsession. Turn this messed-up overdose-y heroine into a star streamer.
让有些玻璃心的女孩“糖糖”变身为“超绝最可爱网络天使”，面向宅男们开直播吧！
info:
